languages.text: "Знаешь, чем хороши спятившие жестянки вроде тебя? Когда вас убиваешь, остается много полезных запчастей. Лично из тебя я сделаю походную рекафоварку".
"You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, чем хороши спятившие жестянки вроде тебя? Когда вас убиваешь, остается много полезных запчастей. Лично из тебя я сделаю походную рекафоварку".

traits.locale_text: "You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful repair parts. I think I'll make a portable recaff machine out of you."
"You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful repair parts. I think I'll make a portable recaff machine out of you."
"You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaff machine out of you."

"You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."
"You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."

languages.text: “你知道我为什么很喜欢像你这种发疯的铁罐子吗？因为等我杀了你之后，你会留下来很多有用的零件。我打算把你做成个便携式雷卡咖啡机。”
languages.original_text: "You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."

traits.locale_text: “你知道我为什么很喜欢像你这种发疯的铁罐子吗？因为等我杀了你之后，你会留下来很多有用的零件。我打算把你做成个便携式雷卡咖啡机。”

languages.text: «¿Sabe lo que me gusta de los armatostes desquiciados como usted? Al morir, las piezas de repuesto se siguen pudiendo usar. Creo que esta vez me crearé una máquina de café portátil».
languages.original_text: "You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe lo que me gusta de los armatostes desquiciados como usted? Al morir, las piezas de repuesto se siguen pudiendo usar. Creo que esta vez me crearé una máquina de café portátil».

languages.text: 「お前のような狂ったブリキ缶を好む理由がわかるか？始末すれば、使えるスペアパーツをたんまり落とすんだ。お前からは携帯型の模造コーヒーマシンでも作ろうか」
languages.original_text: "You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のような狂ったブリキ缶を好む理由がわかるか？始末すれば、使えるスペアパーツをたんまり落とすんだ。お前からは携帯型の模造コーヒーマシンでも作ろうか」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, was ich an irren Blechdosen wie Euch so schätze? Wenn Ihr tot seid, hinterlasst Ihr jede Menge nützlicher Ersatzteile. Ich werde wohl eine tragbare Rekaf-Maschine aus Euch machen."
languages.original_text: "You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, was ich an irren Blechdosen wie Euch so schätze? Wenn Ihr tot seid, hinterlasst Ihr jede Menge nützlicher Ersatzteile. Ich werde wohl eine tragbare Rekaf-Maschine aus Euch machen."

languages.text: « Vous savez pourquoi j'aime les boîtes en fer blanc dérangées dans votre genre ? Parce qu'on peut récupérer des tas de pièces détachées utiles sur vos cadavres. Je crois que les vôtres vont me servir à fabriquer une machine à recaff. »
languages.original_text: "You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez pourquoi j'aime les boîtes en fer blanc dérangées dans votre genre ? Parce qu'on peut récupérer des tas de pièces détachées utiles sur vos cadavres. Je crois que les vôtres vont me servir à fabriquer une machine à recaff. »

languages.text: "Senin gibi dengesiz tenekeleri neden seviyorum biliyor musun? İşiniz bittiğinde geride bir sürü faydalı parça bırakıyorsunuz. Sanırım senden portatif bir kahfe makinesi yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "You know why I like deranged tin cans like you? When you're killed, you leave behind plenty of useful spare parts. I think I'll make a portable recaf machine out of you."

traits.locale_text: "Senin gibi dengesiz tenekeleri neden seviyorum biliyor musun? İşiniz bittiğinde geride bir sürü faydalı parça bırakıyorsunuz. Sanırım senden portatif bir kahfe makinesi yapacağım."
